Package org.dkr.graph.algo.community

Class LabelPropagation<K,​VV extends Comparable<VV>,​EV>

java.lang.Object
org.dkr.graph.algo.community.LabelPropagation<K,​VV,​EV>
Type Parameters:
K - ID type
VV - vertex value type
EV - edge value type
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.flink.graph.GraphAlgorithm<K,​VV,​EV,​org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<org.apache.flink.graph.Vertex<K,​VV>>>
public class LabelPropagation<K,​VV extends Comparable<VV>,​EV> extends Object implements org.apache.flink.graph.GraphAlgorithm<K,​VV,​EV,​org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<org.apache.flink.graph.Vertex<K,​VV>>>
The class LabelPropagation discovers communities in a graph, by iteratively propagating labels between neighbors. Every vertex in the input graph must contains a label of its community. The initial vertex values are used as initial labels and are expected to be Comparable.

    static class 
    LabelPropagation.LabelPropagationUpdater<K,​VV extends Comparable<VV>>
    compute the value of a vertex by adopting the most frequent label among its in-neighbors
